abstract: The new iPhone 4S reviews are here. What are the critics saying? Most love the iPhone 4S, specifically its latest software update and the new "humble personal assistant," Siri.
snippet: The new iPhone 4S reviews are here. What are the critics saying? Most love the iPhone 4S, specifically its latest software update and the new "humble personal assistant," Siri.
lead_paragraph: Just two days before the new Apple iPhone 4S hits store shelves the reviews are out. What are the critics saying? To be frank, they're not being very negative; most love the iPhone 4S, specifically the newly improved camera, its latest software update and the new "humble personal assistant," Siri.
